heady.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a heady smell, drink etc is pleasantly strong and seems to affect you strongly
heady.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: a heady combination of wine and brandy
heady.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: very exciting in a way that makes you feel as if you can do anything you want to
heady.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: the heady atmosphere of the early sixties
